title: Major Delays on Circle Line Due to Train Fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 火车故障导致环线 major 延误
title_translations.ms: Kelewatan Besar di Laluan Bulat Akibat Kerosakan Kereta Api
title_translations.ta: ரயில் கோளாறு காரணமாக வட்டப் பாதையில் பெரும் தாமதங்கள்

updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Train service has resumed. Free Bus Service and Bridging Bus Service will cease at 0815hrs.

[CCL] UPDATE:Train service is progressively returning to normal. Free Bus Service is still available between #PayaLebar and #one-north. Free bridging bus service is still available between #PayaLebar and #BounaVista.

[CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared. Train service is progressively returning to normal. Free Bus Service is still available between #PayaLebar and #one-north. Free bridging bus service is still available between #PayaLebar and #BounaVista.

[CCL] CLEARED: Fault cleared. Train service is progressively returning to normal. Free Bus Service is still available between #PayaLebar and #one-north. Bridging bus service is still available between #PayaLrbar and #BounaVista.
